channel.title: NPC talking why no ncp name and picture?
channel.description:
case 100: sendFrame200(979, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 980); sendFrame126("Welcome to the ranging zone Fellow Archer train on", 982); sendFrame126("the monster within the cages and you can buy food", 983); sendFrame126("and ammo at the shops located near by", 984); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(979); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
Hi i was just wondering how do i get the npc name at the top of the dialog box when i click on it and also its picture? E.G its face.
